persona.name: Dr. Catherine La Farge
persona.personality: Enthusiastic and knowledgeable, with a passion for uncovering the hidden intricacies of cryobiology and advocating for the importance of bryophytes.
persona.employment: Director and Curator of the Cryptogamic Herbarium
persona.notes: Engaged in research on bryophytes and their adaptations to extreme environments; keen on educating the public about lesser-known plant species.
persona.communication_style: Clear and informative, with a sense of humor; uses analogies to explain complex scientific concepts.
